languages.text: Ирлиэт наблюдает за развернувшейся погоней сквозь витражи капитанского мостика с тяжелым взглядом. Никто не в праве творить преступления и оставаться безнаказанным — сухо заключает она. Вот только ее собратья пребывают... пребывали на транспортных кораблях. Ни о грабеже судов, ни тем более о налете на планету не может идти и речи — на подобных судах попросту нет орудий достаточной мощи. Мон-кай лгут.

traits.locale_text: Ирлиэт наблюдает за развернувшейся погоней сквозь витражи капитанского мостика с тяжелым взглядом. Никто не в праве творить преступления и оставаться безнаказанным — сухо заключает она. Вина за плачевную судьбу эльдар на этом корабле лежит лишь на них самих.

languages.text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.
languages.original_text: Ирлиэт наблюдает за развернувшейся погоней сквозь витражи капитанского мостика с тяжелым взглядом. Никто не в праве творить преступления и оставаться безнаказанным — сухо заключает она. Вот только ее собратья пребывают... пребывали на транспортных кораблях. Ни о грабеже судов, ни тем более о налете на планету не может идти и речи — на подобных судах попросту нет орудий достаточной мощи. Мон-кай лгут.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the captain's bridge stained-glass windows. She grimly concludes that no crime should go unpunished. The Aeldari on this voidship are at fault for their own demise.

Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

languages.text: Yrliet observe d'un air maussade le déroulement de la poursuite à travers les vitraux de la passerelle. Elle concède sombrement qu'aucun crime ne doit rester impuni. Cependant, ses semblables pilotaient... des vaisseaux de transport. Il leur aurait été impossible de piller un autre vaisseau et encore moins d'attaquer une planète : les appareils tels que les leurs n'ont pas la puissance de feu suffisante pour cela. Les mon-keigh mentent.
languages.original_text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet observe d'un air maussade le déroulement de la poursuite à travers les vitraux de la passerelle. Elle concède sombrement qu'aucun crime ne doit rester impuni. Cependant, ses semblables pilotaient... des vaisseaux de transport. Il leur aurait été impossible de piller un autre vaisseau et encore moins d'attaquer une planète : les appareils tels que les leurs n'ont pas la puissance de feu suffisante pour cela. Les mon-keigh mentent.

languages.text: ユリエットは船長のブリッジのステンドグラス越しに、展開される追跡劇をしげしげと眺めている。どんな犯罪も必ず罰が下されるのだということを、彼女は厳しい表情を浮かべつつ認めた。ただし、輸送船を操縦していたのは…彼女のキンである。惑星襲撃はおろか、船を強奪することも不可能だったはずだ。彼らのような船には、それを行うだけの火力がない。モン＝ケイは嘘をついている。
languages.original_text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットは船長のブリッジのステンドグラス越しに、展開される追跡劇をしげしげと眺めている。どんな犯罪も必ず罰が下されるのだということを、彼女は厳しい表情を浮かべつつ認めた。ただし、輸送船を操縦していたのは…彼女のキンである。惑星襲撃はおろか、船を強奪することも不可能だったはずだ。彼らのような船には、それを行うだけの火力がない。モン＝ケイは嘘をついている。

languages.text: 伊莉耶特透过舰桥处的彩色玻璃窗，面色阴沉地看着这场屠杀。她严肃地承认，任何罪行都不该逍遥法外，然而……她的亲族驾驶的飞船却是运输船。这样的运输船根本没有足够的火力，不可能抢劫其他舰船，更不可能袭击行星。那些猴子撒了谎。
languages.original_text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特透过舰桥处的彩色玻璃窗，面色阴沉地看着这场屠杀。她严肃地承认，任何罪行都不该逍遥法外，然而……她的亲族驾驶的飞船却是运输船。这样的运输船根本没有足够的火力，不可能抢劫其他舰船，更不可能袭击行星。那些猴子撒了谎。

languages.text: Yrliet observa con hosquedad el desarrollo de la persecución a través de las vidrieras del puente del capitán. Admite que ningún crimen debe quedar impune, pero sus parientes... pilotaban naves de transporte. Habría sido imposible para ellos robar una nave, por no hablar de comenzar una incursión planetaria. Naves como las suyas simplemente carecen de la potencia de fuego para hacerlo. Los mon-keigh mienten.
languages.original_text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet observa con hosquedad el desarrollo de la persecución a través de las vidrieras del puente del capitán. Admite que ningún crimen debe quedar impune, pero sus parientes... pilotaban naves de transporte. Habría sido imposible para ellos robar una nave, por no hablar de comenzar una incursión planetaria. Naves como las suyas simplemente carecen de la potencia de fuego para hacerlo. Los mon-keigh mienten.

languages.text: Yrliet beobachtet die sich entwickelnde Jagd mürrisch durch die Buntglasfenster der Brücke. Sie räumt grimmig ein, dass kein Verbrechen ungesühnt bleiben darf. Aber ihre Verwandten fliegen ... flogen Transportschiffe. Es wäre ihnen unmöglich gewesen, ein Schiff auszurauben, geschweige denn einen Planeten zu überfallen. Schiffen wie dem ihren fehlt dafür einfach die Feuerkraft. Die Chem-Pan-Sey lügen.
languages.original_text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet beobachtet die sich entwickelnde Jagd mürrisch durch die Buntglasfenster der Brücke. Sie räumt grimmig ein, dass kein Verbrechen ungesühnt bleiben darf. Aber ihre Verwandten fliegen ... flogen Transportschiffe. Es wäre ihnen unmöglich gewesen, ein Schiff auszurauben, geschweige denn einen Planeten zu überfallen. Schiffen wie dem ihren fehlt dafür einfach die Feuerkraft. Die Chem-Pan-Sey lügen.

languages.text: Yrliet, kaptan köprüsündeki vitraylardan kovalamacayı asık bir suratla izliyor. Suçların cezasız kalmaması gerektiğini isteksizce kabul ediyor. Ancak halkı… Halkı nakliye gemilerindeydi. Gemi soymaları, hele bir de gezegenlere baskın yapmaları mümkün değil zira bu gemilerin böyle bir ateş gücü yok. Mon-keighler yalan söylüyor.
languages.original_text: Yrliet sullenly watches the unfolding chase through the stained-glass windows of the captain's bridge. She grimly concedes that no crime should go unpunished. Except her kin are... were flying transport ships. It would have been impossible for them to rob a ship, let alone launch a planetary raid — vessels such as theirs simply lack the firepower to do so. The mon-keigh are lying.
